column4: hi guys.i'm updating my system but i'm getting a failed msg => W: Failed to fetch http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/libx/libxfont/libxfont1_1.0.0-0ubuntu3.1_i386.deb.404 Not Found
your package index is out of date
you need to update it first (reload in synaptic, apt-get update on the shell)
